text: Badal Jamadar is an Indian teacher and politician. He was elected as MLA of Bhangar Vidhan Sabha Constituency in West Bengal Legislative Assembly in 1991, 1996, 2001 and 2011. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians from West Bengal Category:West Bengal MLAs 1991–1996 Category:West Bengal MLAs 1996–2001 Category:West Bengal MLAs 2001–2006 Category:West Bengal MLAs 2011–2016 Category:Indian academics Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Badal Jamadar
